description:
The output from /images/<id>/meta does not correctly format its xml (according to the spec):

<metadata><key1>value1</key1></metadata>

I expect to see:

<metadata><meta key="key1">value1</meta></metadata>


/images/<id>/meta/<key> does not format xml or json correctly. It requires json be in a "meta" container.
title: OSAPI: images metadata response xml is incorrectly formatted
